mapper.select: select a.id as cart_id, b.id as product_id, b.origin as product_origin, b.brand as product_brand, b.name as product_name, b.thumbnail_img as product_thumbnail_img, b.price as product_price, a.product_cnt from personal_cart a join product b on a.product_id=b.id where a.member_id=#{memberId}
select * from personal_cart where member_id=#{memberId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from personal_cart where member_id= #{memberId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.select: select distinct member_id from group_member_cart where group_id=#{groupId}
select group_nickname from member where id=#{memberId}

select g.product_cnt, g.product_id, p.origin as product_origin, p.brand as product_brand, p.name as product_name, p.thumbnail_img as product_thumbnail_img, p.price as product_price from group_member_cart g join member m on g.member_id=m.id join product p on g.product_id=p.id where g.member_id=#{memberId}
select count(*) from group_member_cart where group_id=#{groupId} and member_id=#{memberId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_MEMBER_CART (GROUP_ID, PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{productId}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete from group_member_cart where member_id=#{memberId} and product_id=#{productId} and group_id=#{groupId}
